name: Cannot publish service with deprecated model — admin_client_with_valid_api_key
description:
BUSINESS RULE: Cannot publish a service when its associated model is deprecated
        Flow: Create model → create service → deprecate model → attempt publish service → expect 400/422/409
        Expected: 400/422/409 with error details
descriptionHtml:
BUSINESS RULE: Cannot publish a service when its associated model is deprecated
    Flow: Create model → create service → deprecate model → attempt publish service → expect 400/422/409
    Expected: 400/422/409 with error details

testStage.description:
BUSINESS RULE: Cannot publish a service when its associated model is deprecated
        Flow: Create model → create service → deprecate model → attempt publish service → expect 400/422/409
        Expected: 400/422/409 with error details

links.name: API allows publishing service with deprecated model

items.statusDetails:
AssertionError: [ADMIN] Expected 400/409/422 — cannot publish service with deprecated model, got 200. Response: "Service 'b86fbda57f4d8610182c687c84c884f1' updated successfully."
assert 200 in [400, 409, 422]
 +  where 200 = <Response [200 OK]>.status_code
